Review.Titre: The refurbished TV that I tried to…
Review.Contenu: The refurbished TV that I tried to purchase was damaged not refurbished.

Review.Titre: Order was created on the 7th of…
Review.Contenu: Order was created on the 7th of November and today is already the 13th and the shipment has not updated.

The HP Pavillion Desktop I received yesterday worked fine for about two hours. Then received the "no boot device found" (3FO) message. Ran all HP diagnostics. No errors found. Reset factory default settings. No help. Submitted help request through Tech For Less. No response as of yet. Looks to be either a motherboard or hard drive failure. No Windows 10 media was provided so unable to attempt an OS re-install.

Ordered a $1,600 television from these guys in open box condition (Samsung The Frame). Got the television and get this, it's missing THE MAIN CABLE that makes the television work. And also the REMOTE CONTROL. Like, not insignificant things, these are things that are absolutely criticalThere's no excuse for these to be missing, but it's clear that nobody in their company is doing an ounce of quality controlThese guys are also unreachable on the weekend. I'm now out the cost of an installer since they made the trip to come install the TV, will have open walls for several days now until this gets rectified and I get the missing cableAt this point I'm concerned about these guys even supplying the missing items, either in a reasonable timeframe or potentially at all. Hence the "borderline" scam. Will keep folks posted, but as the saying goes "What's cheap ends up being expensive"

Review.Titre: I was excited to find a website that I…
Review.Contenu: I was excited to find a website that I could buy a hard drive from for a lot cheaper than regular price, the delivery was swift as well but upon receiving the hard drive and installing it, my dell insiron 15 7579 did not recognize the hard drive and could not install it. Even though it is the correct kind for said laptop version. Very disappointed

Review.Titre: 30 Day return starts when you purchase…
Review.Contenu: 30 Day return starts when you purchase the item, not delivery.I bought a tv from this company that arrived with a crack, but because of delays in shipping I was not able to find this out till after my 30 days was complete because this starts when on the date of your invoice and not on date of pickup. They refused to help at all and I am currently disputing with my credit card. Their shipping also leaves something to be desired because if you don't pay extra they deliver at the end of your driveway, even if your house is a half mile down the road and its raining. Pay the extra with someone else and don't deal with this hassle.

Purchased a NEW Samsung Television.  Decided that I wanted a better model.  Purchased television was cancelled enroute.Tech For Less charged a 20% restocking fee and a return shipping fee for a total fee of $940.  This fee was excessive.  The returned television was returned in a new and unopened condition.

Review.Titre: I bought an open boxed laptop
Review.Contenu: I bought an open boxed laptop , against my every gut feeling telling me not to. An almost $800 laptop and it’s completely useless! It shuts off and doesn’t detect the charger sometimes what kind of crud is that?!? I was so excited to get it and I am beyond disappointed. I’ve had other Lenovo’s before so I know it’s not them. Smh

The delivery of the Bose speaker was fine.  I then sent a  request through the customer service portal and have yet to hear any response from you.  I bought a laptop that I am quite dissatisfied with and sent an inquiry.  No response. thanks :(

Review.Titre: I bought a computer monitor from this…
Review.Contenu: I bought a computer monitor from this site for $247 and it says there are 6 left.  Then two days later they cancelled my order without any notice and raised the price to $621. I advise everyone not to buy anything on this site,
I ordered an item and after they processed my payment the item isn't available. I am very disappointed.
It's the wrong one. It is bigger and heavier than the one that came with the TV and the connector is different. I wasted my time and money.

Review.Titre: I was informed my package would be here today. We canceled a Dr appt to be here. We have an appt tomorrow. I can't cancel twice. We are not happy
Review.Contenu: I was informed my package would b

Review.Titre: I will no recommend buying here
Review.Contenu: I will no recommend buying here. or if you do make sure you read the fine prints. if you intend to return an item they will charge you 20% to return the item this is absolutely a ripoff. I don't know about you but this was the last time I bought something here and I will rather keep the items than give them $120.
I ordered Sony WH-1000XM4, but I received XM3 though box is XM4.

Review.Titre: scratches and stains here and there
Review.Contenu: I bought open-boxed AirPods. But it turns out to be old, long-time used with scratches and stains here and there. I couldn't even clean it with Colorex wipes. It doesn't have a production year so I won't be able to tell when this product was produced. Very disappointed. I won't buy anything from them ever again.

BEWARE fraudulent seller online.  I bought a open item from them that was advertised as new and perfect condition.  When we opened it, it had a large scratch on it, which was concealed under the sticker on the lower right corner.  IT appears they put a larger sticker over it.  The sticker was mint, so the scratch was there prior.  Worse, the refused to credit me or take it back.  I had to get my Credit card company involved to try to resolve.

Review.Titre: Why did you not advise me or anyone…
Review.Contenu: Why did you not advise me or anyone else that there are so many different conditions in order to use this software. I must turn off my current virus software in order to use this software? It also said this is easy to install WRONG! If I could I would never have order this junk. Have a nice day.

Review.Titre: Don't order from these guys, unless you don't mind waiting a LONG time
Review.Contenu: Ok, so I ordered a video game from this company. I researched awhile, to find a company in the United states. I live several hours from where they shipped from, thinking it would only take a couple days.  Long story short, it took almost 2 weeks, to receive a letter sized package,  in the mail!! So do yourself a favor, and find a more prompt company to deal with. I would never order from them again,  nor would I refer anybody else to do so.

Review.Titre: I was under the impression that this …
Review.Contenu: I was under the impression that this  Artograph Flare 150 digital art projector was apple compatible. I did my research as usualbefore buying but nowhere did I find this info. Can you provide me with a return label so that I may send the item back to you? Unless you have an Apple-compatible model, I do not wish to keep it.

Stressr receiving delivery. It’s a 12 hour window to be at home and wait to give signature with FedEx. This is tech for less policy supposedly that customer must be home and receive package at home.  There is no option to pick it up myself from FedEx. The customer support manager was rude, lacks compassion, empathy and has no ability to help just state policy. I was stressed from this and was seeking help to resolve it, but got offended, disregarded and their interaction just escalated my stress.  I will try to never order from this site again.

The one product I ordered from TechForLess was sent via 10th class mail and it took weeks to get the product.  They blamed it on the post office and the post office blamed it on them.  Then the product was defective and I had to contact the original manufacturer and beg them to provide me a replacement which they generously did.  Techforless is not a company I would do business with again.  On top of that, they sent me a review request via their review people TestFreaks who told me I couldn't write a negative review, only a positive review.  No thank you!

They have no idea how to run a business. I heard the manager talking to his co workers with such a disgusting mouth they two time you, and the customer service is just awful. I would not trust this place as far as you could throw them, I hope this company goes down in flames. DO NOT BUY FROM TECH FOR LESS

It is unfortunate that I still have not received my order especially after full payment was made and posted with of course a confirmation of order being shipped.  So the big question back to you is WHERE IS MY ORDER ??? Or my REFUND

"NOT GOOD. I place an order with this company, they email me and cancel my order and tell me that the item, which said was available, was not. Then I visit the website the next day, and yet again the item shows up as available. Additionally, there is a scratch and dent item that I purchase. The next day, they cancel my order again. I think they don't want to sell the item to me because i'm using a discount code and they don't want to honor the discount. Then the next day they put the item back on to sell to someone else. Not good business in my opinion. "
I made two orders and both times they cancelled it! They relisted the item and so I purchased it again just to be canceled again. Would not recommend purchasing from this website!

Review.Titre: I had item ordered and then 2 days…
Review.Contenu: I had item ordered and then 2 days after that they canceled it for no reason. My payment was processed and everything. Sleazy thing to do to a first time customer
I ordered something 3 weeks ago, haven't seen it yet, I am so disappointed, will never order again from them, and I want a refund  awful service

Review.Titre: The TV Screen was cracked and damaged
Genuine Ink?  Not What I Received!
Review.Contenu: Description said genuine ink TN450 and I received  a refurb ink from Office Depot.  What the heck?  Waste of money and false advertising
The cable for use with my printer DOES NOT FIT.  The connector to the printer is WAY TOO BIG so WORTHLESS.

I am new to Tech For Less and have purchased a TV recently. The checkout and delivery itself were excellent. Unfortunately, the TV’s display has two flaws. It is getting worse and worse. I rate the customer service of Tech For Less as insufficient. My contact person was Jessica H. As of today; I am not satisfied with the after-sales process due to my perception:1. I found the telephone and written communication to be lengthy, irritable, and occasionally implicit.2. E-mails remained partly wholly unanswered.3. I did not feel welcomed at customer services. I do think that Tech For Less should work on these issues. ____________________________________________PS: To answer the reply from Tech For LessOn March 27, I submitted my view based on the assumption that the flaw will not worsen. At this moment, I was satisfied with our negotiations. However, my most recent attempts to contact Tech For Less remained unanswered. Despite several tries. I perceived our telephone conversation as inadequate. Occasionally your statements were unreasonably implicit.Additionally, I would like to emphasize that the approach to fix the flaw is entirely out of the question and not subject to my review.
Slow delivery, and when my gadget broke they did not want to even give me advice and just dropped the phone.

Review.Titre: I ordered Something and then my order…
Review.Contenu: I ordered Something and then my order was cancelled for no apparent reason

Review.Titre: Shop Local, they Sell Refurbishe and Used
Review.Contenu: Well, where do i start. I spent hours researching televisions trying to find the one that fits my budget and my needs. i found tech for less on eBay and i thought they had great deals. I thought wrong! They sent the TV with some commercial delivery service that does not normally ship to residential addressing according to the woman at the freight company. After a week of trying to arrange a delivery, i finally got it. The TV came in with burnt out pixels and the picture on the screen jumping all over the place. Completely busted television. They're ad said it was new. I was so upset. I called then and i spoke with a girl named Anastasia in the customer service dept. who speaks with a very calming voice and is so nice which i admit calmed me down a lot. I agreed to purchase a different TV from them which cost almost another 200. (Another Bid Mistake, What was I thinking?) They shipped it fed ex this time so i was able to get delivery much easier. The package job was amateur at best and i never got the original box the TV came in. it looks used. It came in a brown generic box with two little pieces of Styrofoam holding it in place. I opened and set it up. And then i saw it. It was hard to see at first because the border of this Samsung TV is clear and transparent. So as i was peeling the plastic on the stand i noticed a crack in the corner of the border. Another botched delivery. It looks like it was dropped on its side because when you turn the screen on it looks like something is pressing on it the way a touch screen on your phone looks when you press it.  Right now i am sitting here on a Saturday (my day off) waiting for fed ex to come back and pick it up which is what Anastasia told me to do. They gave me a window on when they are coming. Only problem is i just called Fed ex and they haven nothing scheduled at this address at all for the week. The only thing left to do is to call my bank and notify them of this issue and warn all my friends out there.  DO NOT BUY FROM TECH FOR LESS!!

Review.Titre: I ordered an open box Surface Go…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an open box Surface Go Windows 10 laptop and when I started to set it up and got to the account section, it was programmed for a high school and wanted an email or code from that school. I called and the customer service was helpful and very apologetic, and they are exchanging it and promised the new one would be checked over before it was sent. They are paying to have it picked up and shipped back. I thought open box meant open box, but the computer was untouched. I could be wrong. It appears the computer I got was bought for a school but not needed. I want the new one to not be set up for anyone or anything else.

You wanted to remind me to make a review, but you didn't remind me what order this review applies to. I don't want to research what it is I should be reviewing. Therefore, this review applies the review system.

Review.Titre: Samsung RU 8000 TV, very slow delivery!
Review.Contenu: The product I purchased, (65" TV ) works fine. My complaint is the amount of time it took for your delivery service (Pilot) to get it to me was unacceptable!I ordered it on 7/6/20 and got my hands on it on 7/20/20 after I went and picked it up after being told it was going to be possibly another week!

This was my third order with Techforless and the first time there has been an issue. Order was placed 06MAR19 and supposed to arrive on the 8th.  Tracking sent was to the wrong location and I made two attempts at contact via email and online contact to inform them it was sent to the wrong state. The third time I called and left a voice message. No replies were made to any of those inquiries. Seriously? Too busy for an email or phone call? Based on this experience, it is highly unlikely I will do business with them again.

Review.Titre: Old toner cartridge did not work
Review.Contenu: Item I purchased (toner) was way past expiration date and did not work. Tech For Less did refund my money, which is why they get two rather than one star.

After I received my computer I took it out of the box and turned it to get it all set-up. It went smoothly and was super excited to use it. Everything went great until 2 days later the computer got stuck with the message "Please wait while we install a system update". I called customer service but they were already closed which was fine. I was able to get it to boot up after holding down the power button for a few cycles. I was a happy camper until I shut my computer down, when I turned it back on the same screen appeared. I tried doing the same thing as before but it would not boot up. I called on Monday after not being able to use my computer all weekend. Tech gave me the instructions that I had already preformed and nothing. They said that they can refund my money but that doesn't help me, I ordered this computer for a new job that I was starting and now I'm stuck. Between FedEx screwing up my delivery and getting me my computer 5 days late (no fault of Tech for less) and then this problem I used the computer for less than 12 hours. Kind of disappointed.
Product was not in original mfg packaging as described. It was shipped in clear bubble wrap inside a plain brown box.

Review.Titre: Sold items at a good price
Review.Contenu: Sold items at a good price. But as it turns out all I got was broken items at a discount.

Review.Titre: Too many pop ups should be much simpler
I would have given a 5 star but the…
Review.Contenu: I would have given a 5 star but the first tv remote received was used and broken,  when I ordered a open box one. But I talked to an excellent customer service representative named,  I think her name was Heather,  but not sure,  she told me she would call the warehouse and make sure I get what I ordered. She did that and I commend her, the second remote still had factory plastic on it. That girl needs a raise in my book.  5-star on customer service and the second remote.

Review.Titre: Process to purchase scratch and dent…
Review.Contenu: Process to purchase scratch and dent items is very cumbersome and confusing.  Not an easy process to complete my order
Didn't include power supply that normally comes with docking station.

Review.Titre: The laptop showed a lot of use
Review.Contenu: The laptop showed a lot of use, scratches on the cover, keys had wear on the letters.  Also, it runs really slow, for an I7 with 16gb of memory.  My old dual core is actually faster at starting excel and opening file.. Really disappointed...
I called and got some recording about a free Walmart gift card then I was shuttled to some guy in India. Who hung up on me. I will try to call tomorrow. Not feeling hopeful.
Glitchy payment on website, and the website overall is a little clunky.  Plus the price of my product turned out to be higher at this website than a few others.

Review.Titre: Cancelled order on me after previously confirming it was accepted.
Review.Contenu: After placing my order, I routed it through Amazon Pay.  I received a couple of emailed confirmations that my order was accepted.  Based upon that confirmation, I discarded a Visa prepaid gift card after using what I thought was the balance at another retailer. When I learned later that my order was rejected, I had to call Visa prepaid card fulfillment to request a replacement card, at $10 less than face value, for the dollar amount of my cancelled Tech for Less order.  In effect, I had to pay $10 for an order that was never fulfilled.  I have asked Tech for Less to provide me a check or an Amazon gift card for the $10 and am hoping that they do the right thing. UPDATE as of 2/25/19:  I was advised by Tech For Less that Amazon Pay was the reason that the order was cancelled.  I called and confirmed with Amazon Pay that this was indeed the case, but it was a very laborious process to get the credit for the lost value of my gift card.

Review.Titre: The quality of the keyboard did not…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the keyboard did not appear to be of good quality. Also, I need not realize it had a cord.

Review.Titre: I struggled to get through the final…
Review.Contenu: I struggled to get through the final screens as a guest.

After countless hours of fruitless research into various keyboards that would suit my needs some how I came upon Tech For Less. Today i placed my second order.My first order came on date promised with no hassle. The keyboard bought was described on website as acceptable condition. I am very pleased with this keyboard. From what i have discovered going on in marketing, Tech For Less is a breath of fresh air.Thank you Jay L.

The first printer I ordered (open box) did not work and Tech For Less promptly sent a return shipping label. The second printer (different mfg) works fine (new in box). My only complaint is that both these items were simply shipped in the mfg box with no outer shipping box. The way packages get thrown around, I feel the equipment is easily damaged without the extra protection - there might be less returns if packaged safely.

Review.Titre: Products and service so good, it's worth browsing around.
Review.Contenu: Pleased with the quality of the products that I've purchased off of Tech4less. Donny Horning was very helpful in guiding me to the correct cables for my new laptops. Have only experienced a glitch with Amazon pay.  Service and products so good, I'm looking at a large TV purchase.

Review.Titre: Took too long to be delivered and you…
Review.Contenu: Took too long to be delivered and you KEPT BUGGING ME about doing the survey BEFORE the product was delivered. Send the survey AFTER delivery

Review.Titre: When placing order it said I qualified…
Review.Contenu: When placing order it said I qualified for 2nd day Fedex shipping for $3.99, but when I went to check out that option was not available only USPS First Class.

So, the reason it’s four and not five is that it came with the wrong quick start guide. So that meant that I didn’t realise I was following different instructions (the photo looked the same of the product, but mine was a YAS 209 and the manual was for a 408. It meant I had no idea the set up instructions wouldn’t work and I needed a completely different app. Anyway- I will say, shocked to find that an email to Yamaha support resulted in a phone call and everything working! Not only Apple can help you! Ha. The sound is good, esp the Clear Voice function when watching movies. Happy with my order, happy to have used someone other than Amazon!!

My purchase went fine until I tried to pay with my VISA card and was forced to resubmit the card data several times before the sales algorithm accepted it. Otherwise the ordering process went smoothly.

Review.Titre: I bought a Samsung TV remote which…
Review.Contenu: I bought a Samsung TV remote which arrived quickly. Pleased with it overall, but just a slight issue at times with it communicating with the TV.
Great price, yet to receive my purchase. The site is a bit annoying, with pop ups and cluttered pages. Hopefully the camera will be as described when it arrives.

Review.Titre: The Affirm setup needs some work
Review.Contenu: I had to go through the Affirm setup twice because the first one vanished, even though I didn't log out.
Outstanding products for outstanding prices, but the website has to be updated.
Instructions could have been better, otherwise I am figuring it out as I go
Price is fair for a remanufactured ink product.

Review.Titre: Happy with service, prices are a little high
Review.Contenu: Item we wanted to order was in stock, and check out was fast and easy
Great product! Great price! Product arrived 14 days after ordered online.

Review.Titre: The procedure is clear and very user…
Review.Contenu: The procedure is clear and very user friendly....great price..

Review.Titre: It was truly the same tech for less…
Review.Contenu: It was truly the same tech for less price.  Checkout easy, arrived promptly with shipping info for tracking.  However, I believe the description said the box was never opened but when it arrived it did appear the box was opened in the past.  The box was not in the best shape and we took pictures in case any issues with inside.  When opening the box everything was great and factory sealed.

Sometimes, on your checkout sequence, the price changes, and I have to start over.  This may be due to my doing research in other tabs during the process of checking out.  Your products are always more satisfying than expected and can recommend your site wholeheartedly.

I have only been on the tech for less site a couple times. This is the first time I have placed an order. The site is easy top navigate through, has a variety of products, descriptions and prices that vary (unopened & open box). I received an email with information of my order from what I bought, when it was sent out and a number to track my package. Which is appreciated, also in the email are promotions for more deals (daily) to explore. I like the site even though I could not find 1.5v battery chargers I still like to recommend it to users or window shoppers.

After considerable research & buying 2 Vizio E-Class smartys from TechForLess, I decided to get my 1st 4K from them as well. I would've given them 5 stars but I was not readily able to price match competitively during the online completion of the sale. The Vizio brand is king of the poor man's choices IMO.

Shopping experience was great, I took off 1 star as the shipping details are misleading.  The basic free shipping says 3-7 days, doesn't mention this excludes weekends and the day its shipped.  So its really 4-10 days. If I knew this I would have just paid the 4 bucks for 3 day shipping.
Ordered a laser toner dual pack and received only one.  Customer service was very quick to respond and sent out the second toner immediately.  4 stars only because there was a mistake to begin with.

Review.Titre: The lack of specifically listing what…
Review.Contenu: The lack of specifically listing what this unit was compatible with caused me to have to cancel this order.  However, they responded quickly and accurately upon cancelling order!

Review.Titre: Found this item on a google search and…
Review.Contenu: Found this item on a google search and it worked exactly as I needed for my needs.  Price was the lowest I could find and it was shipped promptly.  Overall a good experience!
I had  a very good experiences with Tech for Less,the service Rep was honest about the item that I purchased from this frim
Good transaction. Product as advertised. A little slow, but within reason for the holidays. Thanks!

Review.Titre: I have been buying from them for…
Review.Contenu: I have been buying from them for several years, now.  Everything is as advertised, with no junk.
I am very happy with this monitor; I appreciate the size and the cost.  It's a good value
Check out a little confusing, worked throw it & we'll see how it goes from here.
Straightforward, easy to use website. Shipping and return info easy to understand.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with my purchase
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with my purchase. I received just what I purchased and on time!
Always great pricing. But had an issue trying to apply their own discount code
HAVE HAD GOOD SERVICE. SOMETIMES PROMOTED DISCOUNTS ARE NOT APPLIED.

Review.Titre: Only had a bit of trouble shipping to a…
Review.Contenu: Only had a bit of trouble shipping to a different address

Review.Titre: Very easy to use website lots of stuff…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use website lots of stuff at great price

Review.Titre: Thus far a customer friendly and fair…
Review.Contenu: Thus far a customer friendly and fair staff!
Great prices, but website needs support

Review.Titre: I had no problem ordering on line

Review.Contenu: The item ordered , a nest thermostat arrived perfectly wrapped and the box inside is in perfect condition .Unfortunately I am a retired surgeon volunteering in two hospitals 160 miles from where the item is now located and destined to be installed . I am sure everything in the factory box is also in perfect condition but I did not have time to open it . The installation is scheduled for mid-January and I want the electronics service person to open the box .
Easy to navigate, shipped fast, arrived safe and early, as described or better, maybe one or two e-mails too many(!) but ereally no complaints at all.

This was my first experience with techforless and I must say, I am a fan! I ordered my husbands Christmas gift for a lower cost, and received fast, free shipping, while being able to make monthly payment installations. After browsing the site a bit more it appears that they offer a lot of tech parts and accessories - all delivered in inconspicuous packaging! They also required a signature for delivery of the package, which fedex forged, but is an appreciated touch for the more expensive or hard to come by tech.
i have only ordered the item.  however it was a simple process.

I called with a question about which printers have good cartridge longevity. Other office supply stores answered a similar question with “we have lots of variety, just take a look and see what you like”, but TechFor Less took the time and effort to get me a good answer and direct me to a good solution for what I need.

Review.Titre: Best shopping experience in a long time.
Review.Contenu: Surprised at how easy it was to find what I was looking for and the choices they gave me as to new, open box or refurbished as well as how many of each they had in stock.  They also listed the prices for each making it so much easier to compare and choose the option I wanted. Thank You

Excellent transaction from start to finish! Best price I could find on these JBL LIVE FREE 2 TWS ear buds! Communication was perfect as well. Item was shipped right out fast next day. Order acknowledged, email to let know shipped and tracking. Item as described. Very happy with my purchase, and these ear buds sound excellent!
Ease of finding the product that I needed, helpful customer service, price, and quick delivery.

Lowest price could find  online.  Was shipped triple boxed with padding and arrived factory sealed in perfect condition.  Was able to purchase additional three year warranty directly from Apple after sending copy of receipt to Apple (easy).

Review.Titre: Item arrived in good shape and as promised
Review.Contenu: Item arrived in good shape and as promised.  I have not installed it as yet, but the price beat Amazon's, and I hope that it is reliable as an open box item.  I do wish that tech help was available for install, but instructions should be available from Xfinity/comcast, as it will be replacing their "less than reliable" modem/router.

Review.Titre: Very happy with my purchase of…
Review.Contenu: Very happy with my purchase of refurbished HP laptop. Arrived carefully packaged, no scratches of any kind, machine worked fine as soon as I started with it.My brother, a computer consultant, recommended TechForLess, I think he gave me good advice.Thanks!Gary S. Tong

Review.Titre: We just got a new puppy who is not a…
Review.Contenu: We just got a new puppy who is not a destructive chewer, but happened to get our remote and promptly destroyed it. Part of me was relieved by the prospect of not having to fight over screen time during spring break, but the the bigger half of me panicked about not having the option to watch any TV over spring break. I googled the type of remote and Tech for Less popped up. I’m grateful for their great prices and fast service.

Review.Titre: I was looking for a laptop
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a laptop, but I found a suitable option only on Tech For Less. Latest version, good battery, integrated graphics card, 4 ports. I could go on and on, but I'd rather just say thanks to Tech For Less. The laptop arrived in excellent condition, without damage, with all documents and instruction. I recommend this company to anyone looking for a quality product.

Review.Titre: Right product, great price, works great
Review.Contenu: I received my order quickly. It was as described and packaged well. Everything works correctly and the price was well below the big name common selling platforms. Communication was very good and even included the s/n of the device sent. Given the rate of missing/stolen packages this day and age, that was awesome to see included in the email.

Review.Titre: The checkout was haphazard and would…
Review.Contenu: The checkout was haphazard and would not recognized my previous history... kind of annoying.... but the price and your prior history with me worth the extra effort.  You guys still better than the rest.

I went to Vizio.com and the screen froze... wouldn't allow input on my shipping address  but took my card info immediately... didn't hide the numbers... so I erased all... googled the remote that I needed... clicked your website and all went smoothly... really appreciated that you take Paypal. Thank you for your efforts to offer honest and dependable service.

After a difficult experience with Amazon on delivery delay's I call Tech for Less. The customer service was awesome.Joe Quinn in sales assured me the product would ship with the order. I placed the order and received notice of shipment within several hours. Great client service.

Despite a sketchy-looking website,  my order was taken, processed, and delivered to a remote location with great efficiency.  I got a phone call confirmation that everything went smooth.  Would definitely work with this group again.  Was delightfully surprised.
Amazing service. Fast delivery. AMAZING Prep of my device. Won't find a better deal and value anywhere else. You get EXACTLY what they advertise. No dysfunctional or random crap in the box.

Review.Titre: shopping was easy and completed in very…
Review.Contenu: shopping was easy and completed in very short time. the specs were an important aspect of my shopping. the only thing not in the specs were type and amt of usb and external monitor ports. return procedure was not available if problems with quality or specs.

Review.Titre: Item arrived damaged, but they made it right.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a new, open box item. What arrived at my door was a damaged item, not what I expect from a new open box purchase. It will be returned, but if something is damaged, accurate pictures makes the purchaser happy as they know what they are getting.UPDATE: I changed this review because they reached out to me to get this fixed and were prompt in their resolution. I'll buy from Tech for Less again, knowing they stand behind their promise.

Computer got here quick - placed my order last weekend online and it tried to deliver Thursday which was quick considering recent shipping issues. Only minor problem was it required a signature and we weren't here and got it Friday instead. Thank you!

(date: 6/9/2021; posted under an old, now deleted Trust Pilot account before) Good! Order went through and they had my product I needed. Waiting on item (XL black ink cartridge) to get here now via regular physical mail.UPDATE: got here, and the item works, even though it was remanufactured. I found out it is no longer for sale or made my HP anymore for my printer,so it had to be remanufactured or otherwise some other brand of ink cartridge for it to be filled with black ink and work with my very old HPprinter. So, item arrived and works perfect. No issues. Tech4less has been good to me; good first impressions. It was my 1st order from them ever.

Review.Titre: I had a several questions about both a…
Review.Contenu: I had a several questions about both a laptop I wish to purchase as well, as optional items that I might want to add at some point.  They responded quickly and thoroughly answered my questions.  Based on their service, I chose to increase the intended service plan of 1 year to 2..
Fast shipping, on par with what the details said for my ps5 disc version. Happy customer!!

Review.Titre: Tech for Less is the BEST!
Review.Contenu: Tech for Less is one of my favorite sources for computers, computer related stuff and electronic gadgets.They actually stand behind their word. On two occasions an item I purchased turned out to not work for me and they took it back, shipping paid by them, with no questions asked. This is as rare as a hate mongering politician working for anyone other than the rich and powerful (which includes most of all themselves).Tech for Less has some really excellent pricing and it is a great place to shop which always features free shipping and delivery.  However, you have to be familiar with prices because not all offerings are super great deals, they may be just ok.I recommend Tech for Less for anyone looking to get quality items at great prices with no risk. They stand behind their words.

They are a legit company you can trust to get your orders but their customer support is rude. I spoke with a Jess and she made me feel like I was an idiot. If you don’t care about customer support and only want a good deal then go with them. But other than that, go with a reputable company.Edited: They reached out to me and worked with me to fix the issues. I really appreciate them giving that effort.
Customer Service Agent was very professional and efficient.
The cost of the product made this a great experience. Also, the ease of access and speed to place my order helped. I also appreciate having PayPal to choose.

Transaction went smooth. Made the purchase, it shipped the following day, then arrived 2 days later. The laptop mount that I bought for a new patrol vehicle was priced amazingly. The Same stand on a law enforcement website was $600 more than from this website. So, great prices.

My last minute in store pickup order on a Friday afternoon was filled in minutes. Thanks for handling my order so quickly guys.  Thanks to you I didn't strike out on having my gilrfeiends birthday present ready for the weekend!

Review.Titre: The Acer "out of box" laptop worked great!
Review.Contenu: The Acer "out of box" laptop worked great and I got the manufacture's warranty of 1 year to boot.  Delivered by FexEx in 4 business days.

You surprised me again. When I usually look for an item in electronic I have my usual resources,but they have either been out of that item or do not carry it. Both times I have come to you,had an easy time locating it. Ordered it and received it promptly. Also,now that you have financing options available,it makes it better for me to shop with you.

I found the Logitech Master MX 3 mouse on their website for ~20% less than other stores.  I was able to use Amazon checkout to pay.  It was  shipped promptly and for free.  Arrived in a few business days.  Mouse was new, in original packaging, as described.  Will be sure to check TechForLess again.

Review.Titre: Product was in perfect condition and price was nice
Review.Contenu: Product was exactly as described and arrived in perfect condition,  I used the lowest cost shipping option and the item arrived in 5 days from the placement of the order.  No complaints on my end as I wasn't in any hurry, but if you're used to Amazon Prime delivery speeds, you might be disappointed.
I've purchased products from TechforLess before, as expected there was no let down in price and quantity. Continue to do what you do.Ty,Greg
I like how my earbuds were priced. I thought it was too good to be true but my item arrived undamaged and in unopened original packaging. I am very happy.

Review.Titre: The tech is actually a very low and…
Review.Contenu: The tech is actually a very low and honest price love this site will be buying from here more cant wait till my iphone ships🤞🏽🤞🏽

Review.Titre: I am very pleased with my purchase
Review.Contenu: I am very pleased with my purchase.  Ordering was easy, delivery was on time and the product arrived as described and in the original packaging.

Review.Titre: True to their word the Sound bar I…
Review.Contenu: True to their word the Sound bar I purchased was new, in a sealed package. I was very happy with their service. If you have something you are interested in buying, Tech For Less is good place to go. Watch your selection for a few days though, before you buy. The price could go lower. A week after I ordered my sound bar the price dropped an additional $19.

Well, I get that some might not find concierge white glove service at Tech for Less.  That's not what I come for, I want the lowest price available that is not a huge Walmart like experience.  That is what they deliver for me over and over and over again.   It's my go to for tech stuff for many years.

As usual, always a quick and pleasant pass-through on your website.  Quick and easy billing and it appears a quick sending of the speakers I ordered.  I do not have a car so I could not pick this up personally.  You do have on occasion some great values on many items.  I always open your emails but the multi-thousand-dollar displays are way out of my budget.  I know there are people out there with the money to buy those deals but I am on Social Security so the $7,000 TVs are out of the question.  Your under a hundred items are my style and I thank you for offering them.  I am glad you are there and appreciate your giving such great deals.   What a good business idea for people like me.  Glenn MillerSouth East Colorado SpringsWestern hemisphereUSAPlanet EarthWhat the hell is the name of our Solar System anyway? Way out there I suppose.Go, Brandon!

Review.Titre: My new go-to for audio and video!
Review.Contenu: I got a really good price on the headphones I ordered, easily beating Amazon’s lowest price. They arrived within a few days, and were in excellent condition.
Ordered a replacement Kensington USB cord for my docking station. Arrived quickly. Nicely packaged and works great!!! Thank you!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

The prices are great, I called to update my order and received excellent customer service with a sort wait time.  What else do you want?  I highly recommend Tech For Less.
NVME SSD received as described. Open Box and in excellent condition. Unused (boot count was 0). Very fast shipping. Thanks!
They were amazing! We got a great price on a Frame tv, we had some issues with it when it arrived, and the customer support was amazing!! I will definitely buy from them again!
Amazon had this product but would not take my PayPal account. Saw it was sold from Tech for less using Amazon, so I went to the Tech for less and bought it direct from them using my PayPal credit.
The headphones were priced very reasonable and shipping was fast and the company is good about keeping you up to date on shipping.
The price was better than any other website and the transaction went smoothly and quickly.  Opening an account was simple and the email confirmations for the order were instantaneous.

Review.Titre: Needed a tablet with a budget
Review.Contenu: Needed a tablet with a budget, found one and received it quickly.  It was in the original box with accessories. Experience was so good buying another.

Review.Titre: Nice to get what you want and get going.
Review.Contenu: Quick and easy checkout great shipping options if you need your stuff fast. All was pleasant experience will buy again from your store. Thank You.
Service was very quick. Item purchased was as described but better. Speedy delivery was appreciated. Would do business again.

Review.Titre: Would buy from them again, no question
Review.Contenu: TLDR: I recommend them!Overall, an excellent experience.  There was a slight issue with their webpage when I ordered what I was after.  The checkout process was easy and smooth, but a strange thing happened after I got the order number and confirmation screen.  I switched to my email and saw I received an email exactly as expected yet when I swapped back to my conformation webpage it had changed to inform me what I ordered was out of stick.  However, the item out of stock was not what I ordered and was the wrong item number.  I contacted their email support found in the email and was answered Monday (I ordered on Saturday) and was passed to sales to investigate.  Within an hour it was confirmed my order was for what I thought and the "out of stock" was not my item.  After a couple more emails back and forth confirming they can ship my item as it was what I ordered.  They also offered to cancel the order if it was not right.Yeah, long story to say kudos for excellent customer support, follow-up, and I received the item just fine.  This is what customer support should be and what a customer should experience ordering from an online company.
Ordering was straightforward, price was good, product shipped immediately, and arrived quickly. Can't ask for more than that.
super easy interface and order experience. item arrived on time.

Review.Titre: An actual person emailed me when there…
Review.Contenu: An actual person emailed me when there was an issue on my order. That’s simply an automatic 5 for me

Best prices on the net. Tech 4 Less has a great web site that is easy to navigate and if a return is needed, it's easy as 1, 2. 3   I love the open box options they offer. I have purchased from Tech 4 Less for 15 years and they always stand behind everything they sell. All my friends love shopping at Tech 4 Less!!
Very easy buying experience and happy with the item bought,there was a mixup with delivery but that was purely down to the courier.Thank you

Review.Titre: The product was easy to find and great…
Review.Contenu: The product was easy to find and great price! The purchasing and checking out process was seamless.

I looked for a computer for days on Amazon and Walmart. I needed to get the price down. Then I just happened. Across this company by accident. Right away I got lucky and saw just what I needed at just the right price I needed. I called them and they told me about the computer then took my info and said afedex would have it. To me in 3 or 4 days. The ordering was so simple and easy. That's the way it should be instead of having to create an online account. As soon as I hung up I had all the order confirmation on the phone. Also the guy who helped me was very efficient and nice. It couldn't have been easier. So glad I came across them!!!
I've ordered a couple things from Tech For Less and have been very satisfied with their prices, service, and communication.
